heading: January 22
text: Visualizing data along Archimedean spiral can efficiently reveal periodic patterns time series data.{spiral_*} function family {spiralize} 📦 draws spiral plots flexibly! 🌀https://t.co/5vybsvWv2e#rstats #DataScience pic.twitter.com/c168IWhcXL

heading: January 23
text: working piped workflow, need extract single column, syntax can bit cumbersome.{pull} function {dplyr} 📦 provides readable syntax end! 💄https://t.co/rCT1vcMZzX#rstats #DataScience pic.twitter.com/vEs2cc7Lw8

heading: January 24
text: need bind multiple dataframes rows, may first wish check can done successfully.{compare_df_cols} function {janitor} 📦 provides summary data types check ! 🍎🍏https://t.co/88zYQFdIWa#rstats #DataScience pic.twitter.com/kSCLESOBP9
